ma-a LUGAL be-li₂ u₂-da x x x x an-ni-iu-u pa-ni-šu₂ i-x x x u₃ a-na-ku ŠU.2-MEŠ-a.a 04 {ANŠE}x-MEŠ a-na {1}{d}PA-DU₃-uš {LU₂}SAG at-ti-din u₃ ma-a 01-en {ANŠE}gam-mal ina ŠA₃-bi 01 2/3 MA.NA KUG.UD i-si-qi a-na {1}mad-a.a {LU₂}qur-bu-te it-ti-din u₃ 80 ANŠE {ŠE}GIŠ.I₃ ša ina UGU {LU₂}ARAD-MEŠ ša {1}DINGIR-ia-da-aʾ ma-a ina UGU-hi-šu₂ es-pu ma-a ki-i {1}DINGIR-ia-da-aʾ pat-tu-u-ni {LU₂}ARAD-MEŠ-šu₂ u₂-zak-ki u₃ ša {ANŠE}u₂-re-e ma-a {1}man-nu-ki-KUR-aš-šur iz-za-az u₃ {1}aš-šur-EN-LAL u {1}DINGIR-ia-da-aʾ a-na {1}KAM-eš-DINGIR {LU₂}SAG iq-ṭi-bu-ni ma-a še-e-ṣi ina ŠU.2 {LU₂}qur-bu-te šu-kun-šu₂ ma-a an-ni-x x x x x x-šu-nu ma-a x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x x še x x x x x x x KA₂.DINGIR.RA{KI} x x x x {1}e-reš-DINGIR ša x x x x ša {URU}ar-zu-hi-na x x x u₃ LUGAL be-li₂ u₂-sa-hir a-na {1}DINGIR-ia-da-aʾ it-ti-din
